content: मुख्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मुखे आदौ भवः यत्] {@--1@} Relating to the mouth or the face. {@--2@} Chief, principal, foremost, first, preeminent, prominent; द्विजातिमुख्यः; वारमुख्या, योधमुख्याः &c. --ख्यः A leader, guide. --ख्यं {@--1@} A principal rite or ordinance. {@--2@} Reading or teaching the Vedas. {@--3@} The month reckoned from new moon to new moon
